item.title: 3 Ways to Convert SAS Datasets to Plain Codes
item.description: 1. If you have SAS Enterprise Guide installed Try one of Chris Hemedinger’s EG plug-ins, “_Data Set to DATA Step_”. Chris also wrote a post for it, Turn your data set into a DATA step program. 2. If you need to embed the dataset to SQL Clauses Use one of Eric Gebhart’s ODS tagsets, “SQL Tagset”. 3. If you want to make your hands dirty… You can also take a bite of some SAS base codes by Rick Langston.
